Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientBoard, Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable, ClientBoard
Represents the scoreboard that tracks players' scores
